name: Cozy Taxi
description:
You've moved in to a new house and all your bunny toys are in the wrong place! Time to listen to some offspring and get some sweet fares, lets get uncontrollably cozy, that's right, it's Cozy Taxi!

Use a joypad, or the WASD to drive, space jumps, and e flips you over when you're stuck, which will happen, a lot, it's all part of the fun!

Made for Ludum Dare 37.

Aim to get all the bunny fares!

I've spent a few hours fixing colliders making the game just a bit more controllable, and less hard, i think it's a lot better than it was, so please give the new version a go! It's technically a post Jam version, but not drastically changed.
